original_text: Then I saw another powerful angel. He was coming down from heaven. He had a cloud all round him, like his clothes. There was a rainbow above his head. His face was like the sun and his legs shone like fire.
korean_text: 내가 또 보니 힘 센 다른 천사가 구름을 입고 하늘에서 내려오는데 그 머리 위에 무지개가 있고 그 얼굴은 해 같고 그 발은 불기둥 같으며

sentences.original_text: Then I saw another powerful angel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 다른 강력한 천사를 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was coming down from heaven.
He had a cloud all round him,
There was a rainbow above his head.
His face was like the sun
and his legs shone like fire.
